messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschoolingdotcom e-mail list
messages.msgSnippet: Oh yes! I think I remember you explaining that a while ago. No need to change a thing, it s an awesome sig line - much better than mine - which is none. :o) So
messages.messageBody:
Oh yes! I think I remember you explaining that a while ago. No need to change a thing, it's an awesome sig line - much better than mine - which is none. :o) So when are you moving?

Karin



Elissa wrote:

OK, I think I ave to come up with a new sig line. That is what I think
Cowboys sing while out on the range in the SW and we are moving to the Land
of Dodd, er ... Land of Enchantment also known as New Mexico.

Someone help me think of a better sig line for moving out there onto a small
farm!
Elissa, who will soon be singing
Yippee - Kai - Yay!

messages.subject: Re: unschoolingdotcom e-mail list
messages.msgSnippet: I think you hit the nail on the head with that one.  One of my neighbors asked me yesterday how educationally sound is this home thingy (her words) thing you
messages.messageBody:
I think you hit the nail on the head with that one. One of my
neighbors asked me yesterday "how educationally sound is this home
thingy (her words) thing you do with the kids"... I calmly
responded "wow did you learn that grammer in school".. She didn't get
it....
Dawn


--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., "gruvystarchild" <starsuncloud@c...>
wrote:
> I'm over at the unschooling.com e-mail list trying to explain why
the
> terms "educational" would best be dropped from the vocabulary in
> order to fully embrace the unschool mindset.
> Talk about feeling like you're swimming upstream.
> Man am I glad for this list, where everyone seems to have a deep
> understanding of what freedom from the school mindset is!!!
> I love you guys.
> Ren

messages.subject: unschoolingdotcom e-mail list
messages.msgSnippet: I m over at the unschooling.com e-mail list trying to explain why the terms educational would best be dropped from the vocabulary in order to fully embrace
messages.messageBody:
I'm over at the unschooling.com e-mail list trying to explain why the
terms "educational" would best be dropped from the vocabulary in
order to fully embrace the unschool mindset.
Talk about feeling like you're swimming upstream.
Man am I glad for this list, where everyone seems to have a deep
understanding of what freedom from the school mindset is!!!
I love you guys.
Ren
